name: "Vancouver Seasonal Photography Tour with YuCun" - Mapleleafs & Vancouver Downtown (6 Locations)
description:
The Maple Leaf on the Canadian flag symbolizes
the love and respect Canadians have for the nature, and you will understand why
through this one-and-only seasonal photography tour with photographer YuCun
Tang. Not
only you and your friends/relatives will visit Vancouver downtown, during
the only time of the year (late Oct to early
Nov), for photographing poster-like Maple Leaf (4 locations);
but as a bonus, YuCun wants to share with you two of his secret locations for
viewing and photographing the best of Vancouver has to offer. "It is
only this time of the year and it is designed only for you!".
